intension: Design a Facebook ad for a discussion on the ethical issues surrounding artificial intelligence.
globalcaption: The image features a man wearing a white lab coat, standing next to a robot. The man appears to be working on the robot, possibly repairing or maintaining it. The robot is positioned to the right of the man, and it seems to be the main focus of the scene. The man is wearing glasses, which adds to the overall intellectual atmosphere of the image.
keywords: ai, artificial, automation, business, coding, computer, digital, electronic, electronics, innovation, intelligence, machine, program, programmer, programming, robot, software, solution, technology, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue and red square, with the red square being larger and covering most of the image. The blue square is positioned within the red square, creating a contrasting color scheme. The blue square is slightly larger than the red square, and both squares are placed next to each other, creating a visually striking composition

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a man wearing a white lab coat, standing next to a robot or a mannequin. The man appears to be working on the robot or mannequin, possibly performing maintenance or testing. The robot or mannequin is positioned to the right of the man, and it seems to be the main focus of his attention. The scene takes place in a room with a chair located in the background
